rows.content: # Work Experience --- > This is a zooming user interface. > > - To zoom in, click a nested tile > - To zoom out, click the background I wear a lot of hats. What is always at the center of my work is the user. Whether it be addressing user pain points with new features or creating new technologies and experiences to transform the way humans think and interact.

# Google

---

**Title:** Senior UX Engineer  
March 2019 - May 2019

At Google I worked on the "Think with Google" marketing team creating data visualizations and data interactives.

# HiRoad

---

**Titles:**
- Senior Front-end Engineer  
June 2016 - June 2018
- Senior Geospatial Engineer  
June 2018 - February 2019

As front-end engineer I worked collaboratively with our product team, breaking work down into user stories and iterating on front-end features.

As a geospatial engineer I worked with our data science team creating predictive models to enhance mobile telematics.

# Salesforce

---

**Title:** Senior UX Engineer  
January 2016 - June 2016

As a senior UX engineer I worked in close collaboration with the Salesforce IoT product team delivering technical feedback on feasibility and implementation.

# GoPro

---

**Title:** Senior Front-end Engineer  
August 2015 - December 2015

As a senior front-end engineer I provided engineering expertise in user interfaces across product teams.

# Google / Prototyping

---

I prototyped data rich interfaces for "Think with Google" marketing initiatives. My daily work involved iterating on core functionality in response to changing requirements and integrating feedback from business stakeholders.

# Google / Design

---

I participated in weekly design reviews, providing feedback on feasibility for front-end interfaces and data interactives.

I collaborated closely with designers providing guidance on implementation details such as motion design, and interaction.

# Google / Engineering --- I lead front-end development across a number of stacks including Dart/Angular and Typescript/React. I developed software for generating random data within parameters. Utilizing this software enabled front-end development to coincide with development of back-end services. In addition to my other responsibilities I reviewed resumes and conducted interviews of potential front-end engineering candidates.

# HiRoad / Operations

---

I lead operations on a rotating schedule. During rotation I attended daily meetings with customer support and business stakeholders escalating bugs and other service affecting issues.

I documented a set of standard operating procedures for other engineers on rotation.

# HiRoad / Prototyping --- I created an interactive data visualization for project management. The application integrated with Jira project management software providing immediate visual feedback on the status of all current projects and identification of blockers.

# HiRoad / Design

---

I collaborated closely with our product team creating an interface for viewing past driving data. For this work I jointly filed the patent "Method and System for Visualizing Personal Driving Data".

I regularly interviewed design candidates assessing their ability to articulate design decisions and collaborate with engineering.

# HiRoad / Engineering

---

I developed front-end interfaces and data visualizations with React. I created shared component libraries enabling rapid development and ensuring close parity with design.

I developed unit and integration tests ensuring that product features met specifications.

I jointly filed the patents "Declarative Interface for User Interaction Design" and "System and Methods for the Secure Synchronization of User Interface State Amongst Computing Devices".

I conducted interviews of front-end engineering candidates and facilitated on-site tech challenges.

# Salesforce / Prototyping

---

I prototyped the Salesforce IoT platform editing interface. The interface itself is a state diagram of the different possible states a fleet of IoT devices can be in. I prototyped the mathematics used in generating the layout as well as the interaction model.

In addition to the editing interface I prototyped the live view which scales the size of each state in the diagram proportionally to the number of devices in that state.

# Salesforce / Design

---

I worked as the sole engineer embedded in the Salesforce IoT product team. I provided technical feedback and implementation strategy on iterations of features.

I iterated with designers suggesting changes to interaction models and layout to keep designs consistent.

# Salesforce / Engineering --- I developed layout algorithms and user interface code for the Salesforce IoT editing interface using React and D3. I collaborated across teams in the development of the Salesforce Lightning Design System and components which build upon it.

# GoPro / Prototyping

---

I prototyped the content upload user experience and the front-end interface of user profiles for the GoPro social platform.

# GoPro / Engineering --- I developed web based features of the GoPro social platform using React. I contributed to the development of features for GoPro Studio video editing software using QT and JavaScript.

# O-X Innovation

---

**Title:** Owner  
March 2007 - September 2015

As the owner of O-X Innovation I have participated in projects for a diverse client base. My clients have ranged from artists and architects to multi-national organizations including Microsoft and the United Nations.

# O-X / Operations

---

I monitored and maintained client websites hosted on various cloud hosting platforms.

I regularly updated my clients' content management software as I developed new features.

# O-X / Prototyping

---

I conducted user research and product development for feature additions to the content management and e-commerce software I developed for my clients.

I contracted as a full-stack developer in prototyping the video upload and sharing interface for a social media platform.

# O-X / Design

---

I took project specifications from clients implementing redesigns and feature additions on individual projects.

I designed the interface for the content management and e-commerce software powering my clients' websites.

# O-X / Engineering

---

I have worked with a number of different platforms, programming languages, and frameworks in my client work.

**Platforms:** Amazon Web Services, Google Cloud Platform, Heroku, Rackspace

**Programming Languages:** JavaScript, Ruby, Python, PHP

**Frameworks:** React, Angular, D3, Express, Sinatra, Django, Ruby on Rails, Code Igniter

**Content Management Software:** Drupal, Wordpress

**Unit Testing:** Jest, Mocha, Karma

# Gage Design

---

**Title:** Full-stack Engineer  
November 2007 - February 2009

As a full-stack engineer at Gage Design I developed the front-end and back-end of client websites and administered the content management systems which powered them.

# Gage Design / Operations

---

I provided day-to-day operations support for client websites resolving any reported bugs.

I conducted database migrations as needed in response to feature development.

I developed feature additions to our e-commerce platform providing tax code lookups for products sold in effected regions.

# Gage Design / Design

---

I designed the editing interface for features in our content management and e-commerce platforms.

I designed the motion interaction for our first client website which used a single page interface.

# Gage Design / Engineering

---

I developed database backed websites on the Linux, Apache, MySQL, and PHP (LAMP) stack.

I created client websites built with PHP using the Code Igniter framework.

# HiRoad / Research

---

I developed machine learning models adding weather predictions to augment existing mobile telematics. Each model was built and trained using Python, SciKit Learn, and Jupyter Notebooks.

I created Extract-Transform-Load (ETL) pipelines generating data sets for training weather models from daily NOAA weather data.

# Bean Software

---

**Title**: Founder & CEO  
August 2023 - Present

I founded this company to execute on a vision that protects the Intellectual Property (IP) of prompt engineers while enabling automated data entry of AI prompts. Bean Software's first product offering Bean Trade is an AI prompt marketplace that enables prompt engineers to monetize their content while protecting their IP.

# One

---

**Title**: Staff Software Engineer  
April 2022 - November 2022

At one I lead development on a new iteration of their product for web.

# Opendoor

---

**Title**: Senior Frontend Engineer  
October 2020 - November 2021

I worked on two different teams during my time at OpenDoor. The first team I worked on was focused on creating internal tools. The second team I worked on was customer facing building the app experience for selling your home with OpenDoor.

# OpenSpace

---

**Title**: Senior Frontend Engineer  
June 2019 - February 2020

At OpenSpace I worked extensively with computer vision engineers developing a prototype of a 3d point cloud visualization built with React & Three.js.

# OpenSpace/Engineering

---

I collaborated extensively with machine vision engineers working on the video player codec.

To enable visualization work I built a system for synchronizing point cloud by forward loading and caching data in sync with video playback.

# OpenSpace/Prototyping

---

I prototyped an interface that projected 3D point cloud data over video captured with a 3D camera. If the user paused the video they could then measure the distance between any two points in a unit of their choosing.

# Opendoor/Engineering

---

I built the frontend of several internal tools for inventory management for Opendoor's agents that interface with institutional real estate.

I built a system for form validation of forms with completely dynamic content.

I worked extensively on the design system used by internal tools across the organization.

I built several components and maintained the design system used for publicly facing OpenDoor products.

# One Finance/Engineering

---

I acted as lead developer on the new user experience for One Finance products. I built out the initial infrastructure as well as the design system and core features.

I engaged in future proofing of the web user experience by developing a system for translation of strings used in the product.

I researched multiple solutions that addressed major developer pain points and performance optimization to rendering and infrastructure.

# One/Operations

---

I helped to orchestrate the launch of the new user experience for the web.

I integrated Applitools machine vision based visual regression testing into the web product experience.

# One/Design

---

I built out much of the web experience and the design system that powered it.

I maintained close communication with product in multiple iterations of the designs for the new application.

# Bean Software/Design

---

I oversaw product development and engineering from initial design through to implementation.

# Bean Software/Engineering

---

I built tools and infrastructure for enabling the creation of an AI prompt marketplace.

# Bean Software/Research

---

I lead development of AI features that automated quality control for the Bean Trade AI marketplace.
